title: PMS 2.0 294 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, Week 10 NFL Recap, MNF Preview, Adam Schefter, AQ Shipley, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys recap Week 10 of the NFL season and chat about all the different games and everything that happened around the league including the Hail Mary in the Arizona/Buffalo game, the Bucs being back, the Packers barely beating the Jags, and the Patriots beating the Ravens in the elements in Boston. Also joining the show is ESPN Senior NFL Insider, Adam Schefter to chat about the injury statuses of Drew Brees, Christian McCaffrey, what he thinks will happen in Philadelphia after the season, and his thoughts on week 10 of the NFL season (29:20-45:03). Next, undefeated Center for the Tampa Bay Bucs, AQ Shipley joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about starting for the Bucs this weekend and whether or not he was worried about his conditioning, what it's like playing with Tom Brady, his thoughts on Bruce Arians trolling the media, and much more (45:05-1:02:25). Next, 9 Year NFL vet at DB, co-host of the Man-To-Man Pod, and friend of the program, Darius Butler joins the show to give a couple of locks for tonight, chat about his thoughts on the Hail Mary in the Buffalo/Arizona game and whether the DB's were in the correct position, and much more (1:02:27-1:14:28). Lastly, is another installment of McAfee and Hawk Sports Talk where Pat and AJ give their thoughts on NFL week 10 and what their biggest takeaways were, the commentators that were calling the games, and much more (1:14:30-1:31:01). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
